98936.「刻印を 刻まれし者よ。\n 汝の命……我らの供物として 捧げよう。: You who bears the mark. Offer your life to us.

98937.<cs_pchero>は 清めの洞くつに戻った。:
<cs_pchero> returned to the Cave of
Purity.

98938.しかし 突然のめまいに おそわれ\n意識が 遠のいていく……。:
But they are suddenly overcome with dizziness
and lose consciousness...

98939.<cs_pchero>は 気を取り直すと\n夢占い師の水晶玉を 清めた。:
<cs_pchero> regained their composure and
cleaned the Dreamer's Crystal Ball.

98940.「……水晶玉よ 我が問いに答えたまえ。 \n あまたに分かれし 運命の糸をたぐり:
O crystal ball, answer my plea. Pull the many
threads of fate, and show us the path we
must take!

98941.「お前さん 夢の中で刻まれた刻印が\n 現実の世界でも 胸に 刻まれたのじゃな？:
You have the same marking on your chest in the
real world which was engraved in your dream,
don't you?

98942.「すでに 予感しているかもしれんが\n その刻印が 完成する時\n そこに 待っ:
I'm sure you have at least an inkling of what
will happen once that mark is completed...

98944.「……その刻印は 夢に現れた存在が \n お前さんの 強い生命力に目をつけ\n:
That mark is one of a being that appeared to you in your dreams. That same being realized your strong life force, and now you're its
target.

98945.「そやつは 多くの人々に 同じ悪夢を見せ\n エモノを物色しているようじゃの。\:
It seems it is looking for something that will force many others to experience the same nightmare. You have been chosen as a
sacrifice...

98946.「で お前さんに刻印を刻んだ存在だが……\n ひょっとすると 名前くらいは\n:
So, the being that put that mark on you...
maybe you've heard of him, at least by his
name.

98947.「その名は…… ダークドレアム。 \n 夢の世界に君臨する 破壊と殺りくの神じゃ:
His name is... Nokturnus. He is a being of
death and destruction, and reigns in the world
of dreams.

98948.「やつは エモノとなった者の生命力を奪うことで\n チカラを増幅させ 夢の世界か:
He most likely plans to invade this world by
stealing the life force of a sacrifice, which
will amplify his power.

98949.「放っておけば 他にも 刻印の犠牲者は出よう。\n 何より ドレアムが この世界:
If left unchecked, many others will be inflicted with that mark. There's no telling what kind of destruction he'd bring to this
world.

98950.「どうやら 紅衣の悪夢団とやらは やつを崇め \n その手先となっている 集団の:
It seems a group calling themselves the
Redcoat Nightmares work for and worship him.
They have me in their sights...

98951.「ふぉっ ほっ ほっ。なに 心配するでない。 \n わしが協力すれば 刻印の進行:
Ho ho ho. Don't worry. With my help, we can
stop the mark's progress and thwart their evil
schemes.

98952.「だが…… 今すぐには 無理じゃ。\n 夢占いは お前さんが思ってるより ずっと:
But... right now, I need to rest. Reading
dreams takes more energy than you may think.
Let us both rest for a while.

98953.「お前さんにも やるべきことがあるようだね？\n それが終わったら また ここへ:
It looks like you have your own business to
attend to as well. Come here when you're done.
I'll forsee how to remove the mark then.

99084.「……ふむ。どうやら 事態は\n わしが 思っていたよりも 深刻なようじゃね。:
Hmm... It seems the situation is more serious
than I thought...

102467.「……我が供物よ。 \n 運命に抗うことは できぬと知れ。:
Know that you cannot resist your destiny,
my offering...

102678.「……すべては 我らが 主のために。: ...all for the sake of our Lord.
